Actually, standalone generator reuses FigureGenerator instance while generating multiple fifure classes. Thus underlying ImportAssistant instance is reused as well, forcing imports for the first generated class to be inserted into all of subsequent classes. 

It may provoke tricky compilation problems like the one demonstrated by attached test (attachhment follows).

Expected: StandaloneGenerator should insert only required imports into the geerated classes.
